name: Charles Byrd
seeking: Seeks JV partners who can refer general business professionals and entrepreneurs needing consulting or strategic support. Would benefit from cross-referral arrangements with business coaches, industry communities, or professional networks serving growth-oriented entrepreneurs.

jv_history.partner_name: Interview - Charles Byrd: The Joint Venture Expert

offering: 1:1 VIP coaching, a 12-week coaching program, and speaking engagements.
